description:
biz.dfch.CS.Appclusive.Public
========================

Interfaces, Dtos and Constants of the Appclusive Framework
releaseNotes:
20160805
          # FEATURES

          Gates

          * Added Release method to support releasing gates by name
          * Added constants for min and max Gate Acquire timeouts
          * Changed Gate Dtos to derive form BaseDto
          * Changed BaseEntityCreate to derive from BaseDto
          * Changed GateAcquire dto, changed WaitTimeout to have a valid default of 1 and changed the max to 60000 (was 5000)
          * Changed GateAcquireForEntity dto, changed WaitTimeout to have a valid default of 1 and changed the max to 60000 (was 5000)
          * Changed GateAcquireForEntityKind dto, changed WaitTimeout to have a valid default of 1 and changed the max to 60000 (was 5000)

          PowerShell project

          * Added project for PoSH scripts

          Connectors and Interfaces

          * Added Connectors and Interfaces, which allow to define required dependencies between child and parent node
          * Added Connector Checks on *Nodes*

          # BUGFIXES

          Gates

          * Fixed GateAcquire / Release actions to return false when acquiring or releasing fails (instead of HTTP 400)
          * Required permission for releasing gates changed to GatesCanDelete

          EntityBagsController

          * Template action fixed

          JobBody

          * Added Range validation to only allow valid entities (i.e. >= 1)

          FileMessagingClient

          * Replaced formatted date time in message name with GUID to avoid overriding of messages because of equal file name

          InheritanceManager

          * Avoid copying equivalent ACEs on break inheritance

          # Notes

          ReplicationManager

          * Added Replication for BaseEntity
          * Changed CatalogueManager to use ReplicationManager

          UpdateManager

          * Removed explicit BaseEntity types with generic T

          Appclusive.Products

          * New NuGet Package biz.dfch.Appclusive.Products

          Gates

          * Changed minimum wait timeout to 0 ms

          Constants

          * Modified Constants.EntityKindId enum to be based on Int64 instead of Int32

          StructureMap

          * Added Dependency Injection with StructureMap

          # Migration Manual
          * Update RefreshToken, if necessary! ApiGee may has the new Impersonisation Deny Patch.
summary: Interfaces, Dtos and Constants of the Appclusive Framework
title: biz.dfch.CS.Appclusive.Public
